page.title: 11POST OFFICE & MAIL
page.content: {POST OFFICE} The Post Office is run in a building which was a garage half way along the High Street. In addition to posting mail, it offers other services like paying Pensions, Child Benefit, and Girobank. Even Railcards for cheaper railfares may be purchased here. Because it is a focal point in the community{notices about events}are posted up there, and there is always someone to talk to about{village news. {Mail}is delivered to homes from about 1pm. The mail from the south is brought to Wick on the morning train, and brought to the village by road just before mid-day. The time mail is delivered to homes may vary because weather conditions can affect the arrival of the train in Wick. On some occassions bad weather will mean no mail from the south.
